alert.note: Alert for Madison; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 8:38PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ONONDAGA AND MADISON COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A lake effect snow band which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This lake effect snow band is producing extremely heavy snow at the rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 837 PM EST, a lake effect snow band was along a line extending from Plainville to near Verona Beach and moving south at 10 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Onondaga, Syracuse, Clay, Cicero, De Witt, Lysander, Sullivan, Van Buren, Oneida and Lenox. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 34 and 39. New York Interstate 81 near 16A, and between 17 and 31. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
